data.name: Lamb and Green Squash Dumplings
originalIngredient: 3 scallions, finely chopped, white and green parts

data.name: Miso Kale Caesar Salad

ingredient.name: Kernels Shaved From Raw White Corn

originalIngredient: 1/4 cup organic red or white miso paste
1 teaspoon honey or pure maple syrup
1 large bunch lacinato or curly kale, stemmed, leaves finely chopped and massaged well (using clean hands, massage kale for 5 minutes to slightly wilt)
Kernels shaved from 1 ear raw white corn (about 1/2 cup kernels)
1/2 daikon radish, peeled, halved, and thinly sliced into half-moons (about 2 cups)
2 avocados, pitted, peeled, and cut into 3/4-inch cubes

data.name: Kadi Sauce
originalIngredient: 1 teaspoon finely chopped fresh Thai green chile
1 teaspoon black or brown mustard seeds

data.name: Diner-Style Western Omelet
originalIngredient: 1/4 cup finely chopped bell pepper (any color)
1/4 cup grated Monterey Jack cheese (about 1 ounce)

data.name: Carolina-Style Pork BBQ Sandwiches
originalIngredient: 1 cup apple cider or apple juice
2 cups cooking liquid (reserved from the slow-cooked pork)

data.name: Moors and Christians (Moros y Cristianos)
originalIngredient: 1 medium green bell pepper (about 7 ounces), cored, seeded, and halved
6 Caribbean sweet peppers (ajíes dulces) or 1 cubanelle pepper
2 cups (about 13 ounces) long-grain rice or Uncle Ben's converted rice
1 medium yellow onion, finely chopped (about 1 1/4 cups)
1 medium green bell pepper (about 7 ounces), cored, seeded, deveined, and finely chopped (about 1 cup)
1 tablespoon distilled white vinegar, or to taste
1 tablespoon dry sherry, or to taste

data.name: Tamarind "Teriyaki" Chicken Skewers
originalIngredient: 1 tablespoon tamarind paste (or substitute with pomegranate molasses)
8 boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into 1/2-inch-wide strips
White toasted sesame seeds, for garnish
2 green onions, thinly sliced (everything but the bulb), for garnish

data.name: Steamed Whole Fish with Ginger, Scallions, and Soy
originalIngredient: 1 (1 1/2-pound) whole white fish (such as sea bass, branzino, or flounder), cleaned with head and tail intact
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 by 1/2-inch piece fresh ginger, peeled and finely julienned
1 scallion, white and light green parts only, julienned

data.name: Eggplants in a North-South Sauce
originalIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon skinned urad dal or yellow split peas
1.5 pounds slim Japanese eggplants, cut crossways into 1-inch segments, or "baby" Italian eggplants cut in half lengthways and then crossways, into 1-inch segments

data.name: Cowboy Frittata
originalIngredient: 1 cup coarsely grated sharp or extra-sharp Cheddar (1/4 pound)

data.name: Sweet Walnuts
originalIngredient: 10 cups water; plus 6 tablespoons for glaze

data.name: Korean-Style Romaine
originalIngredient: 1/4 teaspoon coarse Korean hot red-pepper flakes
1 teaspoon sesame seeds, toasted and crushed with side of a heavy knife

data.name: North Carolina Pulled-Pork Barbecue

ingredient.name: Bone-in Pork Shoulder Roast With Skin

originalIngredient: 1 (8- to 10-pound) bone-in pork shoulder roast (preferably butt end) with skin

data.name: Vinegar Sauce
originalIngredient: 1/4 cup firmly packed brown sugar, or more to taste
5 teaspoons salt, or more to taste

data.name: Tangerine PieCaramelized Pineapple Turnovers
originalIngredient: 2 small pineapples, peeled, cored, and finely diced
1 cup plus 2 tablespoons (6 1/3 ounces/180 grams) crushed palm sugar
2 cups (10 3/8 ounces/300 grams) all-purpose flour, plus more for rolling
1/3 cup plus 2 tablespoons (1 3/4 ounces/50 grams) custard powder
3/4 cup plus 1 1/2 teaspoons (6 3/8 ounces/180 grams) unsalted butter, at room temperature

data.name: Pumpkin, Corn, and Lemongrass Soup
originalIngredient: 1 fresh lemongrass stalk, root end trimmed and 1 or 2 outer layers discarded
2 1/2 cups fresh or frozen corn kernels (10 ounces; from 2 to 3 ears)

data.name: Zucchini Stuffed with Ground Meat
originalIngredient: 2 pounds medium or small zucchini, about 5 total
2 tablespoons ghee (clarified butter, see Tips, below)

data.name: Greek Turkey Burgers
originalIngredient: 2 pounds ground 93 percent lean turkey breast
1 cup packed fresh spinach leaves, finely chopped
¼ cup pitted black olives, finely chopped
1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh mint or parsley
1 teaspoon garlic powder, or 3 fresh garlic cloves, finely chopped
Olive oil or ghee for frying
Optional toppings: butter lettuce, sliced tomato, sliced red onion, sliced cucumber, more fresh mint or parsley, basil pesto, or feta cheese

data.name: Big-Batch Marinated Bell Peppers
originalIngredient: 8 large red, yellow, and/or orange bell peppers

data.name: Sea Bream Crudo with Lemon and Olives
originalIngredient: 1 1/2 lb. highest-quality sea bream, skin, bones, and blood lines removed
1/2 small red onion, very thinly sliced

data.name: Mediterranean Eggplant and Barley Salad
originalIngredient: 1/3 cup Kalamata or other brine-cured black olives, pitted and halved
1/2 cup thinly sliced red onion, rinsed and drained if desired
Accompaniment: 1 (1/2-lb) piece ricotta salata, cut crosswise into thin slices

data.name: Clam Toasts with Pancetta
originalIngredient: 4 tablespoons olive oil, divided, plus more for drizzling
1/2 small fennel bulb, finely chopped, plus 1/4 cup fennel fronds
1 pound Manila or littleneck clams or cockles
1/4 cup parsley leaves with tender stems

data.name: Spicy Marinated Vegetables and Sardines on Toast
originalIngredient: 8 small any color carrots (about 6 ounces total), scrubbed
2 tablespoons olive oil, plus more for drizzling
A spice mill or mortar and pestle

data.name: Smoky Eggplant Dip
originalIngredient: 1/2 cup plain Greek yogurt or labneh (Lebanese strained yogurt)
1/2 cup finely chopped mint, plus torn leaves for serving
2 tablespoons olive oil, plus more for drizzling

data.name: Pork Tenderloin with Mediterranean Grain Salad
originalIngredient: 3 cups cooked farro, rice, or quinoa
1 1/4 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper, divided
1 cup dry white wine or low-sodium chicken broth
4 tablespoons unsalted cold butter, cut into 8 pieces
1/2 cup coarsely chopped herbs, such as dill, parsley, and/or mint
1/4 cup pitted Kalamata olives, sliced in half lengthwise

data.name: Lamb Gyro
originalIngredient: 2 1/4 inch thick slices Spanish or sweet onion
Kosher salt and coarsely cracked black pepper
1 pound well-marbled, finely ground lamb (from the shoulder)
1 teaspoon espelette pepper or best-quality chile powder
2 tablespoons minced fresh herbs, such as dill, parsley, and/or chives

data.name: Roasted Beet Tzatziki Salad

ingredient.name: Equal Parts Torn Flat-leaf Parsley Leaves
Pickled Beets; Reserve Little Liquid Garnish

originalIngredient: 1/4 cup peeled, seeded, and minced Persian (mini) cucumber
2 radishes, sliced into very thin rounds
1 cup equal parts torn fresh flat-leaf parsley leaves, dill fronds, and mint leaves, plus extra for garnish
1 cup Pickled Beets; reserve a little liquid for garnish
Pinch of ground sumac, for garnish

data.name: Leg of Lamb with Garlic and Rosemary
originalIngredient: 1 (7-pound) semi-boneless leg of lamb, aitchbone removed, fat trimmed to 1/4 inch thick, and lamb tied
1/4 cup dry red wine or beef broth

data.name: Turkish Lamb Chops with Sumac, Tahini, and Dill
originalIngredient: 1 tablespoon Turkish red pepper or Aleppo pepper (or use red chile flakes)
2 teaspoons kosher salt, plus more to taste
3 pounds bone-in loin lamb chops, the thicker the better
1/3 cup fresh lemon juice (from about 2 lemons)
2 to 3 garlic cloves, grated on a Microplane or minced

data.name: Charred Chicken with Sweet Potatoes and Oranges
Shakshuka (Baked Eggs With Spicy Tomato Sauce)
originalIngredient: 1 (28-ounce) can diced tomatoes, including the liquid
1 1/2 teaspoons hawayei (see Cooks' Note), or 1 teaspoon curry powder
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
6 (6-inch) store-bought pita breads or 3 Sofra Pita Breads, split in half widthwise

data.name: Zhoug (Spicy Herb Sauce)
originalIngredient: 2 Hungarian wax peppers, stemmed and coarsely chopped (seeds are good) (see Cooks' Note below)
1 1/2 cups fresh cilantro leaves (from one large bunch or two small ones)
1 1/2 cups fresh flat-leaf parsley leaves (from one bunch)

data.name: Baked Falafel With Orange-Tahini Sauce
originalIngredient: 1/2 cup plus 1 tablespoon freshly squeezed orange juice, divided
1/4 cup plus 2 teaspoons distilled white vinegar, divided
1/2 cup vegetable oil, divided, plus more for pan

data.name: Grilled Cheese Tacos
originalIngredient: 1 small red onion, cut into 1/4"-thick rings
1 pound halloumi or other grilling cheese, sliced into 16 planks (about 1/2"-thick)
Sliced avocado, fresh tomato salsa, cilantro, and lime wedges (for serving)

data.name: Mediterranean Microwave Fish Dinner
originalIngredient: 1 ounce pitted Kalamata olives, thinly sliced (about 3 tablespoons)
1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, divided
2 (6-ounce) skinless flounder or tilapia fillets, 1/2 inch thick

data.name: Khara Huggi or Pongal
originalIngredient: 1 cup basmati rice, preferably Dehraduni, or jasmine rice
1⁄3 cup moong dal or red lentils
4 tablespoons plus 1⁄2 teaspoon ghee or unsalted butter
2 tablespoons cashews, broken into large pieces
1 teaspoon cumin seeds or ground cumin
1⁄2 teaspoon whole black peppercorns or freshly ground black pepper

data.name: Prawn Moilee
originalIngredient: 300g (2 cups) Spanish white onions, sliced (a little chunky is good)
25g (¼ cup) fresh root ginger, cut into matchsticks
300g (about 1 ½ cups) medium tomatoes, cut into small bite-sized wedges

data.name: Spinach and Feta Cooked Like Saag Paneer
originalIngredient: ¼ cup plus 2 tablespoons ghee or olive oil, divided
2 green cardamom pods, or ¼ teaspoon ground cardamom (freshly ground is best)
1 small yellow onion, diced into ½ -inch pieces
1 pound fresh baby spinach (10 to 12 cups)
½ tablespoon fresh lime juice (from about a quarter of a lime), plus more if needed
1 small Indian green chile or serrano chile, roughly chopped
6 ounces feta cheese, cut into ½-inch cubes (a little over ½ cup)
¼ teaspoon asafetida (optional, but really great)

data.name: Hawaij

ingredient.name: Special Equipment: An Electric Coffee/spice Grinder

Special Equipment: an electric coffee/spice grinder

data.name: Paneer Butter Masala
originalIngredient: 1 pound hard paneer, cut into ¾-inch cubes
1¾-inch piece of ginger, peeled and grated
½ cup heavy cream (plus extra to serve)
A handful of toasted flaked almonds

data.name: Cardamom-Pistachio Carrot Cake
originalIngredient: 1 cup (2 sticks) unsalted butter, cut into pieces
1¼ tsp. Diamond Crystal or ¾ tsp. Morton kosher salt

data.name: Little Gem Salad with Buttermilk Chaas
originalIngredient: 5 dried chiles de árbol, lightly crushed, seeds removed if desired
1 bunch red and/or French Breakfast radishes, trimmed, thinly sliced

½ cup fresh English peas, sugar snap peas, and/or 1½"-long pieces green and/or wax beans

data.name: Rose and Yogurt Panna Cotta
originalIngredient: 1 Tbsp. basil seeds (tukmaria) or chia seeds (optional)

data.name: Sweet-and-Sour Dal Bhat

3 dried Kashmiri, guajillo, or New Mexico chiles, seeds removed

originalIngredient: 2 Tbsp. finely grated ginger (from one 3" piece)
1 (14.5-oz.) can chickpeas, kidney beans, or black beans, drained, rinsed
1 bunch curly kale, stems removed, torn into small pieces

data.name: Carrot Curry
originalIngredient: 8 large carrots, peeled and cut into 2- to 3-inch chunks
Garnish: Coconut milk, cilantro leaves, fresh lime juice and zest, rice

data.name: Saffron Breakfast Kheer

A pinch of saffron threads, soaked in 3 1/2 tablespoons (50 ml) boiling water (optional)
A small handful of toasted coconut flakes

data.name: Tandoori Chicken Sheet-Pan Supper
originalIngredient: 1 jalapeño pepper, seeded and finely chopped
2 pounds bone-in, skin-on chicken parts (a mix of breasts, split and cut in half, thighs, and legs)

Mango Chutney (homemade or your favorite store-bought chutney)

3 cups cilantro leaves with tender stems; plus more for serving (optional)

2 árbol chiles (or other small dried red chiles, such as Thai or Indian red chiles)
1/4 cup low-sodium tamari (or low-sodium soy sauce)

Suggested accompaniments: Cilantro, mint leaves, and plain yogurt

data.name: Chinese Broccoli With Soy Paste
originalIngredient: 1 lb. Chinese broccoli or broccolini, trimmed, cut in thirds crosswise
¼ cup soy paste (such as Yu Ding Xing)

originalIngredient: 3 ounces spinach (ideally Chinese water spinach; about 2 cups packed)

originalIngredient: 3 scallions, finely chopped, white and green parts

originalIngredient: 2½ tsp. sliced dried licorice root or fennel seeds
A spice mill or coffee grinder

¼ tsp. freshly ground white pepper (optional)
Gochugaru (fine Korean red pepper powder; for serving; optional)

data.name: Scallion Pancakes With Chili-Ginger Dipping Sauce

data.name: Pork Wontons With Sesame Sauce
originalIngredient: ¼ tsp.	freshly ground white pepper (optional)

originalIngredient: 2 skinless, boneless chicken breasts (12–16 oz. total)

ingredient.name: Dried Buckwheat Noodles Such As Soba Noodles

data.name: Crispy Kimchi and Scallion Pancakes
originalIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon chopped dried red chile pepper
1/4 cup kimchi liquid (reserved from draining the kimchi)

1 tablespoon chopped fresh medium-spicy red chile pepper (such as Thai bird or cayenne)

data.name: Manchurian Green Beans with Tofu
originalIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds green beans, ends trimmed, cut into 3-inch pieces
2 scallions, thinly sliced (white and green parts; about 1/2 cup)

2 árbol chiles (or other small dried red chiles, such as Thai or Indian red chiles)
1/4 cup low-sodium tamari (or low-sodium soy sauce)

data.name: Grilled Pizza
originalIngredient: 1 ¼-oz. envelope active dry yeast (about 2¼ tsp.)
⅓ cup (42 g) whole wheat flour
2 Tbsp. extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for bowl
3 cups (375 g) bread flour, plus more for surface
½ tsp. crushed red pepper flakes
½ oz. Parmesan, finely grated (about ½ cup)
Extra-virgin olive oil (for brushing and drizzling)
1 1-lb. ball mozzarella, torn into bite-size pieces
4 oz. sliced pepperoni and/or thinly sliced soppressata (optional)
Basil leaves, torn if large, and crushed red pepper flakes (for serving; optional)

data.name: Beans and Greens Polenta Bake
originalIngredient: ¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for drizzling
¼ tsp. crushed red pepper flakes (optional)
1 bunch curly or Tuscan kale or escarole, tough ribs and stems removed, leaves torn into bite-size pieces
1 Tbsp. white or red wine vinegar
¼ cup finely grated Parmesan, plus more for topping

data.name: Soft Polenta with Mushrooms and Spinach
originalIngredient: 75 g (2.6 ounces) Parmesan cheese (about 3/4 cup grated)
Olive oil, for greasing and frying
150 g (5 1/4 ounces) mushrooms (just one kind or a mixture), sliced into smaller pieces, if necessary
Salt and freshly ground pepper, to season

data.name: Raw Tomato Sauce
originalIngredient: 1/2 cup passata di pomodoro, or strained tomatoes
1 pinch of crushed red pepper flakes
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

data.name: Ackee Tacos with Island Guacamole

2 to 3 tablespoons coconut oil or other vegetable oil

2 dozen frozen ackee or 2 cans ackee, drained (or 2 cups ackee, cooked from fresh)
Salt and freshly cracked black pepper to taste
1 cup shredded lettuce or purple cabbage

data.name: Summer Pizza with Salami, Zucchini, and Tomatoes
originalIngredient: 2 lb. store-bought pizza dough, room temperature
1 tsp. freshly ground black pepper, divided
2 medium zucchini (about 1 lb. total), thinly shaved lengthwise on a mandoline or with a vegetable peeler

data.name: Pasta with Sausage and Arugula
originalIngredient: 2 small red onions, sliced into 1/2"-thick wedges
8 oz. hot or sweet Italian sausage (about 2 links), casings removed
10 oz. gemelli, casarecce, or other medium pasta

data.name: Sheet-Pan Chicken with Tomatoes and Mozzarella

4 pieces thin-sliced skinless, boneless chicken breast, or 2 skinless, boneless chicken breasts (about 1 lb.)
10 oz. fresh mozzarella, thinly sliced into rounds
1/2 small red onion, thinly sliced into rounds
1/2 cup peperoncini (about 3 oz.), thinly sliced crosswise

data.name: Cast-Iron Pizza with Fennel and Sausage
originalIngredient: 12 oz. store-bought pizza dough, room temperature

Crushed red pepper flakes and torn basil leaves (for serving)

data.name: Salad Pizza
originalIngredient: 3 tablespoons plus 1/3 cup extra-virgin olive oil
1 large head of Bibb lettuce, leaves separated and torn
4 ounces thinly sliced prosciutto, but any good thinly sliced ham will be delicious here

data.name: Flatbread Caprese
originalIngredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour, plus more for kneading
1 teaspoon sea salt, plus more as needed
4 ounces fresh mozzarella, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1/2 pint grape tomatoes, sliced into 1/4-inch-thick rounds

data.name: Culantro Pesto
originalIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste
1/3 cup grated Parmesan and/or Pecorino Romano cheese

data.name: Pesto–Heirloom Tomato Pizza
originalIngredient: 1/2 to 1 cup firmly packed fresh basil leaves, or to taste
Juice of 1/2 lemon or 2 tablespoons bottled lemon juice, or more to taste
1/2 cup walnut halves or shelled unsalted pistachios or 1/4 cup pine nuts (omit nuts if you’d like a less caloric pesto)
6 ounces baby spinach, arugula, watercress, or a combination
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
Heirloom tomatoes, sliced, to taste (preferably a mix of yellow and red varieties)
Basil leaves, thinly sliced, for topping
Vegan Parmesan-style cheese and fresh oregano for topping (optional)

data.name: Whole-Wheat Pizza Crust
originalIngredient: 1/4 cup safflower or extra-virgin olive oil

data.name: Za’atar Fish and Chips

1 (1¼-lb.) skinless, boneless cod fillet, preferably in 1 piece

data.name: Sheet-Pan Potato Hash with Fixins

1/4 cup plus 2 Tbsp. extra-virgin olive oil

Trout or salmon roe, chopped dill, and thinly sliced red onion (for serving)

data.name: Smoked Salmon Tartare
originalIngredient: 8 oz. smoked salmon, cut into 1/4" pieces

data.name: Crispy Fish Sandwich

data.name: The Garlickiest Fried Rice
originalIngredient: 4 scallions, thinly sliced on a diagonal

originalIngredient: 2 pounds/900 grams cod, cut into 16 pieces

1 cup (8 ounces/240 milliliters) club soda, chilled, plus more as needed

data.name: Fish and Chips with Malt Vinegar Mayonnaise

1 cup corn flour or all-purpose flour
1 1/2 pounds cod, haddock or pollack, cut into long, 1 1/2"-wide strips
Old Bay seasoning, flaky sea salt (such as Maldon), and chopped fresh dill
Ingredient info: Corn flour, which is more finely ground than cornmeal, is available at Latin markets, natural foods stores, and bobsredmill.com.

data.name: Summer Corn and Cod Chowder
originalIngredient: 8 scallions, thinly sliced, whites and greens separated

data.name: Vine-Smoked Trout

data.name: Fish-and-Chips

data.name: Fish and Chips with Tarragon-Malt Vinegar Mayonnaise

data.name: Grilled Swordfish Verde

data.name: "Fish and Chips"

data.name: Big-Batch Pancake and Waffle Mix

data.name: Okonomiyaki With Bonito Flakes

carrot 1/2, peeled and cut into thin matchsticks
soy sauce and pickled ginger slices for serving (optional)

data.name: Spicy Seattle Tuna Rolls
originalIngredient: 4 Green Thai chiles, stemmed, coarsely chopped
1 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon grated peeled fresh ginger
1/2 teaspoon kosher salt plus more for seasoning
1 pound sashimi-grade yellowfin tuna fillets, cut into 1/8" cubes
4 toasted dried nori sheets, halved lengthwise
Assorted fillings, such as sliced scallions, English hothouse or Persian cucumbers, cilantro leaves, and chive blossoms
**Ingredient info:**Look for Thai chiles, nori, and chive blossoms at better supermarkets and at Asian markets.

data.name: Frisee with Crisped Salmon Skin and Warm Sherry Vinaigrette
originalIngredient: Ten 1-inch-thick slices of French or Italian bread (3 inches in diameter)
Salmon skin (from a 2-pound salmon fillet) (We advise you make this dish only if you have plans for the rest of the salmon fillet!)
Half cup plus half tablespoon hazelnut oil
12 cups frisee (curly endive), torn into pieces, washed thoroughly, and spun dry

data.name: Pomegranate Cocktail
originalIngredient: 6 ounces premium vodka (Blowfish Sushi uses Han Soju, an Asian spirit)

data.name: Sushi Rice
originalIngredient: 2 cups short-grain white rice (sometimes labeled "sushi rice")
1 1/2 teaspoons kosher or coarse sea salt
1 (6-by 3-inch) piece kombu* (dried kelp), wiped lightly with damp cloth
*Available at Asian markets and some health food stores

data.name: Avocado and Watercress Salad
originalIngredient: 1 tablespoon grated sweet onion such as Vidalia or Walla Walla (use large holes of a box grater)
1/4 cup finely grated peeled Gala apple (use small holes of box grater)
6 cups watercress (thin stems and leaves only; from 1 large bunch)
